# information-security/lesha/lab3

```bash
> runhaskell rsa_keygen.hs k 128
Open key
128 65537 234486408178014571578979269608968112027

Closed key
128 118436441758222658153294097214141231169 234486408178014571578979269608968112027

> escript rsa.erl e 128 65537 234486408178014571578979269608968112027 fileFrom.txt fileTo.txt
> escript rsa.erl d 128 118436441758222658153294097214141231169 234486408178014571578979269608968112027 fileTo.txt fileFinal.txt
